      private Connection mConnection

  • Method Details

    • getDatabase

      static Database getDatabase(String db_url, String port_default, ArrayList<String> dbTable)
      Get a fully-configured connection to the database
      Parameters:
      db_url - The url to the database
      port_default - port to use if absent in db_url
      dbTable - ArrayList of all SQL tables to use
      Returns:
      A Database object, or null if we cannot connect properly

    • getDatabase

      static Database getDatabase(String ip, String port, String path, String user, String pass, ArrayList<String> table)
      Get a fully configured connected to the database
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of server
      port - The port on the server
      path - The path
      user - The user ID to use
      pass - The password to use
      table - The ArrayList of all SQL tables
      Returns:
      Connected Database

    • createPreparedStatements

      private static Database createPreparedStatements(Database db, ArrayList<String> dbTable)
      creates prepared SQL statments
      Parameters:
      db - The connected database
      dbTable - The list of db tables we want to connect
      Returns:
      The database with SQL statements

    • disconnect

      boolean disconnect()
      Close the current connection to data database, if it exist
      Returns:
      true if connection closes as expected

    • insertRow

      int insertRow(String subject, String message, int userid)
      Insert a row into the database
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject for this new row
      message - The message body for this new row
      userid - The userID of author
      Returns:
      The number of rows that were inserted

    • selectAll

      ArrayList<PostData> selectAll()
      Query the database for a list of all subjects and their IDs
      Returns:
      All rows, as an ArrayList

    • selectOne

      PostData selectOne(int id)
      Get all the data for a specific row, by ID
      Parameters:
      id - The id being requested
      Returns:
      the data for the requested row, null otherwise

    • deleteRow

      int deleteRow(int id, int userID)
      Delete a row by ID
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the row to delete
      userID - The id of user wanting to delete it
      Returns:
      the number of rows deleted, -1 if error

    • updateOne

      int updateOne(int id, String title, String message, int userID)
      Update the message for a row in the database
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the row to update
      title - The title of the message
      message - The new msg contents
      userID - The id of user wanting to update it
      Returns:
      the number of rows updated, -1 on error

    • toggleLike

      int toggleLike(int id)
      Deprecated.
      As of sprint 8, this feature has been deprecated in favor of toggleVote(int, int, int)
      Add a like to a row in the database
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the row to add the like
      Returns:
      the number of rows updated

    • toggleVote

      int toggleVote(int id, int vote, int userID)
      Checks to see if user upvotes or downvotes a post. If it already exists in the LikeData, then it will remove it
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the post
      vote - value of the vote
      userID - ID of user
      Returns:
      number of rows updated (1 on success)

    • findVotes

      int findVotes(int postID, int userID)
      Finds if a user already voted for a post
      Parameters:
      postID - post's ID to check
      userID - user's ID that voted
      Returns:
      vote value (1 or -1 if voted, 0 if not)

    • deleteVote

      int deleteVote(int postID, int userID)
      Deletes the user's vote from the likeTable
      Parameters:
      postID - post's ID to delete the vote
      userID - user that is removing the vote
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 on error

    • totalVotes

      int totalVotes(int postID)
      Finds the net total votes of a post
      Parameters:
      postID - The id of post to check
      Returns:
      The net vote count

    • findUserID

      int findUserID(String email)
      find the userid based on email
      Parameters:
      email - to find
      Returns:
      id of user, 0 on nothing

    • findUserIDfromSub

      int findUserIDfromSub(String sub)
      find the userid based on email
      Parameters:
      sub - to find
      Returns:
      id of user, 0 on nothing

    • getUserSimple

      UserDataLite getUserSimple(int userID)
      Gets simple user information from id
      Parameters:
      userID - id of user
      Returns:
      UserData of id, username, and email

    • getUserFull

      UserData getUserFull(int userID)
      Gets full user information from email
      Parameters:
      userID - Gets email
      Returns:
      UserData of id, username, email, gender, and SO)

    • insertUser

      int insertUser(String username, String email, String sub)
      Adds a new user
      Parameters:
      username - The username to add
      email - The email to add
      sub - The sub to add
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 if fail or 0 already exists

    • updateUser

      int updateUser(int userID, String sub, String username, int gender, String SO)
      Updates user profile
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID associated with user
      sub - The user's sub value to verify
      username - The new username
      gender - The new gender
      SO - The new SO
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 on fail

    • deleteUser

      int deleteUser(int userID)
      Deletes a user from database
      Parameters:
      userID - to delete
      Returns:
      1 on success, 0 on failure

    • insertComment

      int insertComment(String message, int postID, int userID)
      Inserts a comment to a post
      Parameters:
      message - Comment message
      postID - which post is commented
      userID - author of comment
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 on failure, or 0 if none

    • updateComment

      int updateComment(String message, int commentID, int userID)
      Updates a comment for user
      Parameters:
      message - Comment message
      commentID - Which comment to update
      userID - Author of edited comment
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 on error, 0 if fail

    • deleteComment

      int deleteComment(int commentID, int userID)
      Deletes a comment
      Parameters:
      commentID - id of comment
      userID - id of user
      Returns:
      1 on success, -1 on error, 0 on failure

    • selectComment

      CommentData selectComment(int commentID)
      Select a single comment
      Parameters:
      commentID - comment's ID to select
      Returns:
      CommentData

    • selectAllCommentByPost

      ArrayList<CommentData> selectAllCommentByPost(int postID)
      Selects all comments for specific post
      Parameters:
      postID - id of post
      Returns:
      ArrayList of CommentData

    • selectAllCommentByUserID

      ArrayList<CommentData> selectAllCommentByUserID(int userID)
      Selects all comments for specific post
      Parameters:
      userID - id of user
      Returns:
      ArrayList of CommentData

    • selectAllComments

      ArrayList<CommentData> selectAllComments(int userID, int postID)
      Selects all comments for specific post and user A user can make multiple comments to a single post
      Parameters:
      userID - id of user
      postID - id of post
      Returns:
      ArrayList of CommentData
